title: Hurricane Laura Carves Destructive Path Across Louisiana
summary: Although the storm surge was less than projected, Laura was responsible for at least six deaths and extensive property damage.

title: 8 Nebraska Huskers football players sue the Big Ten
summary: Eight players from the University of Nebraska football team are suing the Big Ten Conference, requesting an order to invalidate the Big Ten's decision to not play football this fall

title: US alleges Russian armoured car rammed American vehicle, injuring soldiers
summary: White House said alleged move was ‘unprofessional’ when patrols from two countries’ militaries confronted each other in Syria

title: Jacob Blake: Donald Trump to visit Kenosha amid unrest
summary: US President Donald Trump is to visit the city in Wisconsin which has seen widespread unrest since a black man was shot in the back and seriously injured by a policeman.

title: Biden, Trump tussle over whose America is dangerous
summary: "Ask yourself: Do you feel safe in Trump’s America?" Biden says in a new video.
